org.dspace.servicemanager.config
Class DSpaceConfigurationService

java.lang.Object
  org.dspace.servicemanager.config.DSpaceConfigurationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.dspace.services.ConfigurationService
public final class DSpaceConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.dspace.services.ConfigurationService

The central DSpace configuration service. This is effectively immutable once the config has loaded.

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

getConfigsByPrefix

public java.util.List<DSpaceConfig> getConfigsByPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
Get all configs that start with the given value.

Parameters:
prefix - a string which the configs to return must start with
Returns:
the list of all configs that start with the given string

getServiceNameConfigs

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ServiceConfig>> getServiceNameConfigs()
Returns:
a map of the service name configurations that are known for fast resolution

setConfiguration

public void setConfiguration(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DSpaceConfig> configuration)

loadConfiguration

public java.lang.String[] loadConfiguration(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
                                            boolean clear)
Load a series of properties into the configuration. Checks to see if the settings exist or are changed and only loads changes. Clears out existing ones depending on the setting.

Parameters:
properties - a map of key -> value strings
clear - if true then clears the existing configuration settings first
Returns:
the list of changed configuration names

loadConfiguration

public java.lang.String[] loadConfiguration(java.util.List<DSpaceConfig> dspaceConfigs,
                                            boolean clear)
Load up a bunch of DSpaceConfigs into the configuration. Checks to see if the settings exist or are changed and only loads changes. Clears out existing ones depending on the setting.

Parameters:
dspaceConfigs - a list of DSpaceConfig objects
clear - if true then clears the existing configuration settings first
Returns:
the list of changed configuration names

loadConfig

public boolean loadConfig(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
Loads an additional config setting into the system.

Parameters:
key -
value -
Returns:
true if the config is new or changed

clear

public void clear()
Clears the configuration settings.

loadInitialConfig

public void loadInitialConfig(java.lang.String providedHome)
Loads up the default initial configuration from the dspace config files in the file home and on the classpath.

replaceAndAddConfig

protected boolean replaceAndAddConfig(DSpaceConfig dsConfig)
Adds in this DSConfig and then updates the config by checking for replacements everywhere else.

Parameters:
dsConfig - a DSConfig to update the value of and then add in to the main config
Returns:
true if the config changed or is new

replaceVariables

protected void replaceVariables(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DSpaceConfig> dsConfiguration)
This will replace the ${key} with the value from the matching key if it exists. Logs a warning if the key does not exist. Goes through and updates the replacements for the the entire configuration and updates any replaced values.

readPropertyFile

protected java.util.Properties readPropertyFile(java.lang.String filePathName)

getCatalina

protected java.lang.String getCatalina()
This simply attempts to find the servlet container home for tomcat.

Returns:
the path to the servlet container home OR null if it cannot be found

makeServiceNameConfigs

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ServiceConfig>> makeServiceNameConfigs()
Constructs service name configs map for fast lookup of service configurations.

Returns:
the map of config service settings
